Description
Common Enemy labs change the stats of basic
enemies
during rounds. When labs are researched, the base modifiers between enemies will no longer be accurate (ex: boss health will not always be x20 basic if basic health is researched).
Common Enemy Health
Common Enemy Attack
Common Enemy Health Research
Unlocked
lab
in
Milestones
at tier 9 wave 10. Decreases basic enemy health at all waves. Has 30 levels.
Level
Time
Cost
Expand
Value

Common Enemy Attack Research
Unlocked lab in Milestones at tier 9 wave 10. Decreases basic enemy attack at all waves. Has 30 levels.
